attributes.action: Be proud, fly the Union Jack,
attributes.additional_details:
I believe that the people of this great nation feel that we as a country has lost its identity.  We have embraced change but at the same time lost our way.
The Uk has rich and amazing history  envied by other nations, one that we should learn from not be ashamed of  
Men and women have died in defending 
Show the world wave our flag 
If we as a nation can be proud of flag we will endeavour to strive  to make this great nation a prosperous and peaceful place to live Representation  is everything
attributes.background:
I would like to see our Great world renowned Flag flown from all council and government buildings that the Tax payer contributes to
All UK airports and ports 
I have visited many countries around the world and they all fly their national flag with Pride
Put the Great back into Britain

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require all public buildings to display the Union Jack flag
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726537
